long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of being interrupted by pesky ads while enjoying your favorite content on YouTube? Look no further! Skippy is the smart tool designed to effortlessly skip YouTube ads without the need for manual intervention. Say goodbye to the annoyance of waiting for the "Skip" button to appear - Skippy takes care of it all for you.

v1.2 new features:
- can now disable/enable the extension by clicking on the icon on the toolbar. the icon will be greyed out when disabled.
